entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Sunday 01 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 31. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Sunday 01 May 2016
